title: Don't wait! These move-in deals are going fast!
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom  2 Bathroom | 1185 sq ft | $3045 - $3464/Month', 'Residences at Stevens Pond', '1 Founders Way', 'Saugus, MA 01906', '(781) 232-7097', 'Description:', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Discover the finest apartments in Saugus, Massachusetts at The Residences at Stevens Pond.', 'With spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes featuring a variety of well-appointed floor plans, you will surely find an apartment home that fits your needs.', 'Complimentary package acceptance, a sparkling pool and an adrenaline pumping fitness center are just some of the amenities that residents will enjoy at The Residences at Stevens Pond.', 'Set on professionally-maintained, landscaped grounds, our pet-friendly community is conveniently located just minutes from US-1, I-95 and I-93.', 'Visit The Residences at Stevens Pond apartments in Saugus, Massachusetts today!', 'Corner, two bedroom unit that offers wrap-around windows, a nice open living area and ample closet space.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Cathedral or 9 ft. Ceilings In Select Units', '● Central A/C', '● Full-size Washer and Dryer', '● Fully-Equipped Kitchen with Gas Range', '● Gas Burning Fireplaces In Select Units', '● Generous Closet Space', '● Loft Style Apartments In Select Units', '● Newly Renovated Units', '● Pre-Wired for High-Speed Internet and Cable Access', '● Private Patios and Balconies', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '● Indoor Half-Basketball Court', '● Online Payments', '● Online Payments Available', '● Online Work Orders', '● Proud Affiliate of the NAA', '● Virtual Golf Simulator', '● Arcade Games and Billiards Table', '● Clubhouse (Newly Renovated!)', '● Fitness Center (State-of-the-Art with over $40k of New Equipment)', '● Outdoor Pavilion/Fireplace', '● Pool (Newly Upgraded)', '● Pool Deck (Brand New!)', '● Spa (Heated)', '● Tot Lot (Outdoor Little Tikes Play Area)', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: $1500', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Pets: We charge monthly pet rent of $75, per pet per month.', 'Breed Restriction.', '(781) 232-7097', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1A2F89E73472479']
